sentences.sentence: Obsidian: Spirits in general will play a prominent role in Mask of the Betrayer.
sentences.translation: 黑曜石：总体来说，精灵在《背叛者的面具》里是个比较显著的角色。

sentences.sentence: We decided to not pursue any tattooing system for Mask of the Betrayer.
sentences.translation: 我们决定在资料片里不再增加纹身系统。
我的血亲和我的背叛者。
